workshoptitle: Database Basics with SQLcl MCP Server Workshop

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Preparing Your Environment
tutorials.description: Set up your environment for SQLcl MCP Server

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Starting and Managing SQLcl MCP Server
tutorials.description: Learn how to start and manage the SQLcl MCP Server

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Using SQLcl MCP Server Tools
tutorials.description: Explore the tools available in SQLcl MCP Server

tutorials.title: Lab 4: How SQLcl MCP Server Works
tutorials.description: Understand the inner workings of SQLcl MCP Server

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Hands-on with SQLcl MCP Server
tutorials.description: Practical exercises using SQLcl MCP Server

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
